Featuring 10 adrenaline-fueled levels, players will experience the visceral thrill of demolishing buildings, crushing cars, and even confronting civilians in their quest for dominance. With each mission lasting a tense 3 minutes, every second counts as you unleash destruction upon the cityscape.

King Kong City Destroyer isn't just a game—it's an electrifying journey into the primal power of nature unleashed. Are you ready to answer the call of the wild and leave a trail of destruction in your wake?

item.title: Only Golf
item.description:
About This Game

Only Golf is a challenging golf game that puts players' skills to the test.

The game features a series of increasingly difficult levels, each with its own unique set of challenges and obstacles. In Only Golf, the objective is simple: hit the ball into the hole. However, the game is not that simple, as player must take into account the direction of the wind and adjust their shot accordingly. If the wind is blowing in the wrong direction, the ball may go too far or too slowly, making it difficult to hit the hole.

Only Golf is the perfect game for anyone who loves golf or enjoys a good challenge. With its intuitive gameplay, challenging levels, and stunning visuals, this game is sure to provide hours of entertainment for players of all ages. So, grab your clubs, adjust for the wind, and get ready to become a golfing master in Only Golf!

Game Features :
- Golf rules
- Showed wind direction
- 5 strokes per attempt
- Multiple levels

item.title: Jets Killer
item.description:
About This Game

Jets Killer is an action-packed game where you are in charge of defending your military base from enemy helicopters that are attacking.

You will have to choose one of the three powerful bazookas available and use it to the fullest to eliminate the threat. With realistic sound effects and animations, you will feel like you are in the heat of the battle.

The gameplay is simple, yet challenging. You will have to aim carefully and calculate the trajectory of the missile to hit the moving targets. As you progress through the game, the difficulty level increases, and you will have to be quick on your feet to dodge enemy fire while taking down their helicopters.
With its engaging gameplay and exciting action, Jets Killer is a game that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Whether you are a casual gamer or a hardcore fan of action games, this one is sure to keep you entertained for hours on end.

Game features :
- 3 types of bazookas
- Battle against waves of enemy jets
- Military camp attacked
- Limited time

item.title: Project Hunt
item.description:
About This Game

This semi-realistic hunting experience lets you explore and hunt in large-world environments. Discover true-to-life animals in beautiful natural habitats and handle various detailed and realistic weapons.

Create your own Hunting experience. With a wide range of options, stretching from rifles to handguns, each with different types of ammunition and suited for different-sized animals, it's up to you to find your favorites and regularly practice your aim as you account for wind and bullet drop.

item.title: FURRY BACKROOMS
item.description:
About This Game



FURRY BACKROOMS is a cooperative horror game for 1-8 players, as well as a single-player mode.

The PLAYER попадает into an unknown anomaly and is transferred to creepy and atmospheric rooms - the BACKROOMS. Here you will be met by a terrible and dangerous FURRY who can do something bad to you! I do not recommend meeting him... Or do I?



Gather your friends to go through these terribly tense rooms together and meet the FURRY!

What to expect from the game?

  • Minimalistic interface, realistic graphics and oppressive atmosphere will provide a complete immersion in the world of FURRY BACKROOMS.
  • Cooperative mode will allow you and your friends to fully experience the atmosphere. Try to escape from the FURRY!
  • BACKROOMS are fraught with danger. Various liminal spaces will break your brain.
  • Regular updates - adding new locations and mechanics.

item.title: Epic of Brave
item.description:
About This Game



Epic of Brave is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) adventure where the players can create strategical tactics, craft exceptional weapons, combine powerful spells and experience ultimate battles.

Enhanced with real-time multiplayer experience, flawless controls and beautiful graphics the players can join different matches, collect rare and exceptional materials, customise their heroes and team up against powerful enemies.

Join the battle between Sentinels and Resistance!

Battle or Campaign

Matches are intense, quick-fire engagements where you face off against other players or AI-controlled opponents. Victories in Matches earn you a variety of Resources such as currency, experience points, and specific match-related loot. The more challenging the Match, the greater the rewards. Additionally, exceptional performances may grant bonus Resources, encouraging players to push their limits and strive for excellence in every engagement.

Campaigns, on the other hand, are more extended, story-driven missions that are solo endeavors. These offer a different set of challenges and opportunities. Successful completion of Campaign objectives yields not only substantial Resources but also rare and unique Materials that are crucial for crafting advanced weaponry and armor.

Meet the Metropolis of Champions

Choose any of the four Champions - the Paladin Tyriel, the Warrior Barath'Dur, the Archer Alessia or the Mage Rachel. Every one of them is gifted with different set of skills and expertise, making them unique and invaluable allies in the face of any challenge. Each champion possesses unique strengths and abilities that can be utilized to strategically overcome any obstacle.

Climb the Ranking

Every Match and Campaign gives you the chance to prove your battle expertise and brings you closer to one of the five exceptional Ranks:
- Apprentice 1-6 Level
- Champion 6-12 Level
- High Lord 12-18 Level
- Manipulator 18-24 Level
- Illuminati 25 Level

Craft Epic Weapons and Armors

The participation in Matches and Campaigns grants you Resources and Materials, which you can exchange or use to build unmatched Weapons and Armors. As you engage in the thrilling Matches and challenging Campaigns that await you, you will amass an abundance of Resources and Materials. These valuable resources are the key to crafting the ultimate weapons and armor, empowering the Look of your Champions.

Accomplish Quests and Achievements

The Excellence in Battle is recognised and collected in the form of Achievements. They enhance your Visual Representation and serve as a testament to your prowess on the battlefield. Achievements are badges of honor, earned through skill, strategy, and valor. As you accumulate these accolades, your Visual Representation undergoes a transformation, reflecting the milestones you've achieved in your journey.

item.title: Timing Blocks
item.description:
About This Game

Timing Blocks is a logic puzzle game suitable for PC, with simple operation and relaxed atmosphere. You can freely match your choices and control small block to reach the finish line.
2D graphics, logical reasoning, highly challenging puzzles, enjoy the process of solving problems

Gameplay Introduction

By controlling the up, down, left, right arrows or WSAD keys to control your block, the block will automatically choose the planned route to move and avoid obstacles, in order to ultimately reach the finish line and achieve ultimate victory

item.title: Suicide Runners
item.description:
About This Game

Classic 2D shoot em up with updated graphics. Dodge a storm of bullets as you blast through space shooting hordes of enemies. Collect powerups to survive against fearsome bosses. Pilot a suicide runner as you fight to unravel the mystery of what is destroying the universe.

Collect Powerups To Even The Odds



Fight Enemies of all Sizes



Dodge Bullets To Survive



Bosses



Features
Choose your own difficulty from 3 lives to 99 lives
8 Handcrafted levels to master
Multiple bosses to overcome and destroy
All sorts of powerups to collect from cannons to rockets

item.title: Between Horizons
item.description:
About This Game



ABOUT THE GAME


Between Horizons is set aboard the Zephyr, humanity's first generation ship en route to another star. You assume the role of Stella, who was born on the ship 24 years ago and recently inherited her father's post as Chief of Security. Dive into the conspiracy behind the incident that threatens to disrupt the Zephyr's social order and foil its mission.

Between Horizons is a modern 2.5D pixel art adventure that brings a branching narrative into a semi-open world. The team at DigiTales has applied numerous lessons from their first game Lacuna and proven solutions to detective game design problems to maximize player agency in the investigation process – all the while maintaining the tight pacing of a meaningful story that will ask you to reevaluate your moral compass and make increasingly tough decisions as the situation aboard the ship spirals out of control.

Features

  • A New Kind of Experience: Between Horizons merges investigative-style gameplay with a branching sci-fi story in an ever-expanding Metroidvania-style environment.
  • Solving Cases for Yourself: The flexible evidence system lets players assign clues to cases, confront ship denizens about them, and submit any case with evidence players have connected to it. Everything found on the ship is connected, but figuring out how — that’s the challenge.
  • At What Cost?: Underneath the game's exciting and plausible sci-fi plot lies a number of thought-provoking problems inviting players to weigh intergenerational responsibility against personal freedom.
  • Getting New Perspective: Timeless pixel art mixed with 3D environments and compelling visual effects come together in Between Horizons, creating a unique, beautiful art style.
  • Failure is Very Much an Option: There are no second chances — submitting wrong solutions means the story will go on and players live with the consequences. A new and improved auto-save system will make sure there is no going back, as the story branches and endings are based on player decisions, none of which can be taken back.



https://store.steampowered.com/app/1921980/Between_Horizons/

item.title: DUCK's most terrible day
item.description:
About This Game

Follow the story of DUCK, a feathered protagonist whose serene pond life is jolted into disarray when a group of misfits abduct her friends and left her without the ability to fly. She does have the unique ability to decelerate time momentarily, allowing for precise jumps, dodges, and attacks, turning imminent failures into triumphant successes.

The story, told in 5 colors and well over 100 pixels per scanline, guides the player through 3 worlds and 20+ levels. Join DUCK in an adventure where every pixel counts!

Rescue your friends!


Your friends have been captured and are imprisoned within cages scattered throughout the game. Leap on top the cages to destroy them and set your friends free!

Timewarp


Save-up warp pellets and enable timewarp to dodge enemy attacks or surprise your enemies with a burst of rapid-fire bullets. You can find these pellets throughout the levels and enemies will usually drop some when they're destroyed.

Enemies


You'll encounter a diverse array of adversaries, each presenting unique challenges. There are some that soar through the skies, others that slither close to the ground and attack at a moments notice. And some simply.. walk.

item.title: LOVE girls
item.description:
About This Game

LOVE GRILS is a relaxing puzzle game.
Features:
♥ Beautiful 25 artworks
♥ "Space" key to quickly complete the current level
♥ Nice music

item.title: Monsters of Mican
item.description:
About This Game

Welcome to Mican! Explore hand crafted dungeons, fight or befriend tons of zany monsters, and discover the ancient truth behind the origin of monsters!

Monsters of Mican is a first person, party based dungeon crawler RPG, often known as a Blobber. The game was heavily inspired by classic PC RPGs such as Might and Magic and Wizardry, with plenty of modern flair and heaps of QOL features.

Features include:

  • Hundreds of unique, whimsical, and sometimes terrifying monsters
  • Dozens of unique monster traits that drastically change what monsters are capable of in battle
  • A highly robust character creator with 14 character classes to choose from
  • Hundreds of abilities/spells, including one unique ability exclusive to each class
  • Dozens of passive skills, each with 5 possible rank upgrades
  • Over 10 large, hand-crafted dungeons
  • Hand crafted NPCs with unique personalities and stories
  • Boss fights with wildly different mechanics
  • Randomly generated loot (and unique named artifacts) with tons of different enchantments and abilities
  • Monster Buddies, a system that allows you to befriend monsters and then visit or summon them to fight for you
  • 6 post-game challenge dungeons with specific themed rules and conditions
  • Monster Rush Challenge: fight every monster in the game, sequentially.
  • Boss Rush Challenge: fight every boss in the game... ALL AT ONCE!
  • An original soundtrack featuring over 20 unique compositions made in the style of classic 90s CRPGs
  • A robust list of difficulty options and video settings
  • An in-game cheat vendor that will trade you powerful wands for various cheat codes
  • Full gamepad controls

The game takes place on Mican, a world turned upside down long ago by an event called "The Amalgam Anomaly" which birthed hundreds if not thousands of different types of monsters, creatures, half-breed amalgams and other nightmares into the world. The game has you venturing into a mountain at the heart of Spiny Island to discover what the monsters in the caves are up to... and discovering other mysterious secrets about the world in the process.

item.title: Mines and Magic
item.description:
About This Game

Multiplayer tower defense auto battler with a strategic economics component.

Units have various magical abilities. Combine units' complementary strengths.

There are more than 150 different units currently in the game, every one of which has a unique ability and fights differently.

Also you can cast spells to help your army.

Expand your territory and build mines and farms to gather different resources randomly scattered around the map.

Resource management, strategic thinking and planning ahead would help to win.

Defending the castle is still the main priority. In case of a defense breach, you can upgrade your castle.

Singleplayer campaign has 20 levels. Each has about 25-35 waves of enemies.

1v1 pvp mode is currently available. 2v2 and 4v4 are being developed.

item.title: NYZD
item.description:
About This Game

NYZD is a Third person zombie shooter featuring up to 4 players local and online co-op.
You have to battle swarms of mutants in order to survive. You can choose 4 different characters and buy new weapons from the trader buy earning money killing zombies or collecting the gold bars scattered around the maps. There are 8 different maps for you to choose and play with your friends by LAN.


Everything started after meteorite hit New York and scientists found a living virus after examining the meteorite. Government tried to turn this virus into a bioweapon by infecting worms with the virus and genetically altering them but it ended up with a catastrophe soon the whole world was devastated. Only couple cities were left those who survived walled off their cities in order to protect themselves from hoards of mutants. You are one of the few NYZD infection control units who somehow managed to survive the hordes of mutants. Your duty is to clean up the designated areas near New York City to help expand the city.


And before you say bro it's just another zombie shooter game.
Well..... you may be right lol but give it a try this time there's more explosions and cool maps to consooom.

And one more thing if you end up stuck in backrooms Developer does NOT take any responsibilities whatsoever you gotta noclip yourself back to reality
(alt f4 might help)

item.title: HEARTS OF COLD - REDEMPTION
item.description:
About This Game

STORY
The year is 2070. The Earth has become unstable and can no longer provide for all our needs. Twenty years ago the World Council ordered that another planet be found that could sustain our population. Father had been assigned as Commander of the survey mission which would take him away for a very long time. I was six years old. I remember waving goodbye the day he left. I never saw him again. So it was that Homo2 was discovered

Things have changed a lot since then and so have I. Homo2 has been made ready to receive our people and I was appointed Commander of a ship in the Orion Fleet which was to be the first making the journey. The Controllers have taken over on Homo2. They would have the planet for themselves and have ordered that further incoming traffic from Earth be intercepted and destroyed.

MISSION
Go immediately to the nearest military Battle Port and board the first available ship leaving for Homo2. Your mission is clear - you must take back Homo2 from the Controllers and allow the colonization to proceed. You will not be allowed to fail.

LEVELS
27 Game Levels

PLAYER
First and Third Person. Walk, Run, Crouch, Jump, Prone, Strafe, Peek, Swim, Climb Ladder. Drive Terrestrial Vehicles, Pilot Airborne Vehicles.

CHARACTERS
Large number of Characters
FRIENDS
Allies, Friendly Helpers, Passive Civilians
ENEMIES
Military, Civilian, Zombies, Vehicles, Animals

WEAPONS
Knife, Pistol, Shotgun, SMG, Auto Rifle, Sniper Rifle, Dual Pistols, Rocket Launcher, Rail Gun, Quasar, Sentry Gun, Grenade, Placeable Mine

COLLECTABLES
Weapons, Ammo, Health

VEHICLES
Truck, Car, Helicopter, Train, Boat, Spacecraft, Moon Buggy

OTHER
Explosive Objects

item.title: Path to Nothing
item.description:
About This Game

Path of nothing is a quick game made in spare time with pixel game maker mv,
Defeat enemies that wil stand in your way, fight and find your way trough the path to nothing
and try to get as many coins to recieve upgrades for your character.

There wil be obstacles, puzzles and bosses on your way trough, some of them have weak spots you'll have to figure out.

Can you become strong enough to make it trough?

item.title: Draw Physics Line
item.description:
About This Game

Its a physics puzzle game.You can draw any shape you want and they are all followed by physics rules when you draw your first line or polygon.
Your goal is to use this physics line or polygon to push the ball to the same color cup.
When the physics ball drop into the correct color cup,the level is finished!
Its a nice brain-training game.Hope you can learn physics from the game.
Have fun.More levels is coming!

item.title: WizUp!
item.description:
About This Game

WizUp! is a wizard idle / incremental / resource management game: kill enemies, collect resources, purchase upgrades, prestige, and repeat!

Start slow and grow stronger, and play at your own pace! Discover over 45 different resources, upgrades, and items with unique mechanics. Here are some of the mechanics you will discover along the way:

-Awaken to earn Paradox Anchors, which can be shattered to obtain Mirrors of Sight, which can be shattered to obtain Mirrors of Remembrance to boost your Global Storage!

-Balance the allocation of your Orbs of Power in order to increase your Rune Drop Chance, your Damage, your XP Gain, and your Chaotic Essence Production!

-Upgrade over 10 unique Rings, such as the Ring of Stars ("The Stars send you aid"), which gives you 1 Star Seed every time your Wizard dies!

Plus much more!

item.title: SEARCH ALL - BALLS
item.description:
About This Game

SEARCH ALL - BALLS

is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the balls in a large location. Balls will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The entire game location looks lively because of the animation elements. Find all the balls! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- 100 balls to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!

item.title: Real Time Attack
item.description:
About This Game

Race to victory in this speedrunning extravaganza! Control the lovable Rucky Anguish as he tries to defeat Do Good Natas and avenge his rat dad. With 16 levels of insane platforming action and built-in timer function, this is one real time adventure you'll LOVE attacking continuously! With full controller support, achievements, and most importantly SPEEDRUNNING LEADERBOARDS, you'll be fluttering with Rucky 24/7/365!

item.title: Forbidden Art
item.description:
About This Game

Forbidden Art is a VR escape room puzzle game where you escape from a killer's secret lair.
Start in the dungeon and work your way through secret passages, studies, morgues, vents, chapel, and more to escape without being seen by the killer.



::MAIN FEATURES::

🔹 REALISTIC GRAPHICS


The beauty of VR is that it allows players to be fully immersed in the environment. We created the backgrounds with a focus on reality to give players the ultimate immersion experience. Feel the killer's lair in VR, a converted abandoned chapel in a remote village in South Korea.


🔹 ROTATION & HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT





This feature was added for players who play seated or are unable to stand for long periods of time due to health reasons.
The rotation function provides instant and smooth rotation and allows players to choose the way they want to play.
Height adjustment offers crouching, standing, and a hybrid mode that allows players to operate both modes with a single button.
Sit back, relax, and enjoy Forbidden Art!


🔹 LIGHT SOURCE


Some areas in the game are very dark, to the point where you can't proceed without a light source. You can use a lighter or flashlight to help you see better in these areas.


🔹 WRITABLE DIARY


While it is possible to solve all puzzles without taking notes, we have added note-taking to speed up some sections and for overall player enjoyment and convenience.


🔹 6m X 6m ROOMSCALE MODE


"Forbidden Art" is a VR game that supports "6m X 6m Roomscale Mode".
The entire map of the game is built to fit a 6m X 6m real-world space, and players can actually walk around and play in all the spaces in the game instead of just pressing buttons on the controller.
If players have access to a 6m X 6m play area, we highly recommend playing in the "6m X 6m Roomscale Mode".

Of course, we realize that not all players have access to a 6m by 6m space.
Therefore, we also offer the "Controller Movement Mode", which allows players who do not have the space to enjoy "Forbidden Art" in VR without any restrictions.


🔹 HUNDREDS OF OBJECTS TO INTERACT WITH


You can grap and interact almost every object in the game, and some of them have special interactions.



🔸 There are no in-game hints to help you escape.
Some of the puzzles can be quite challenging. However, all the clues are in the space you're trapped in. Use the items you have in your inventory, observe the space carefully, and look for ways to escape.
Use all your abilities to escape the dangerous and terrifying hideout created by a psychopathic killer!



::C A U T I O N::
Before first starting the game, make sure there is enough cleared space surrounding you,
with no furniture or any other items around, which may cause injury whilst wearing the headset.
Ensure all motion controllers are fully charged.

item.title: TENSEI
item.description:
About This Game

"Tensei" is an ultra-casual endless action game.

Leap and fall over and over in the style of a brush flowing across paper,
and go on a relaxed journey into the sky. Leave the hectic routine of life behind
for a chance to enjoy this deeply immersive experience.

Playstyle

[Unique Low-Gravity Floating]
Project yourself into the game, relax, and let yourself become immersed in gameplay.

[Purifying Worldly Desires]
You can purify damage zones by dropping (rapidly falling) onto them.
Focus and master the tricks of aiming as you make your way into the skies, avoiding damage as you go.

[Become a Majestic Dragon]
Use triple jumps to navigate from platform to platform while collecting Orbs (ink droplets). Orbs can grant you Boost Mode, letting you turn into a dragon and giving you dynamic flight abilities to navigate new areas.

Game livestreams and videos may be distributed freely
for this title subject to confirmation of and compliance

item.title: Liquid Entry
item.description:
About This Game

liquid entry
Let's transform into slime, collect clean droplets and purify the polluted world

#2.5D #Adventure #Side-scrolling game_Platform #Story_Puzzle
Exploring through puzzles, the number of water droplets collected and users actions taken determine the endings.
Let's gather water droplets using the ability to transform into liquid.



A future where the world's water is polluted and almost no life can live...
An experimental body was created to solve this situation...

But he runs away...!



A boy who turns into slime.



Where will he end up heading?



People everywhere......what are they?

The ending changes only through your choice...!

item.title: Space Hat
item.description:
About This Game

Space Hat is a Fast FPS Platformer, set in a futuristic Sci-Fi world where you play as Vega, a space bounty hunter hired by an organization to execute a contract.
She's one of the most experienced and deadliest mercenary in the galaxy. Better known by the name ''Space Hat'', her mission is to dismantle a space cartel that has become too powerful.

Vega has a range of different moves and attacks including jumps, dash, slides, two fire modes and a powerful punch. The core of the game is about mixing differents combat or parkour moves with her teleporting Hat.



The game has parkour phases, asking for dexterity and combat arena phases in which the player have to eliminate all the enemies. The player's goal is to master the various mechanics to finish the levels as quickly as possible.

Embark on 2 adrenaline-packed levels that offer a unique solo experience : Fast and bloody combats and precise platform phases.
Execute the target and remember the clock is ticking.



  • Kill ennemies with style

  • Teleport everywhere

  • Move at lightspeed

  • Set the best time

item.title: Street Cleaner Simulator
item.description:
About This Game

Every morning he gets into his car and goes out to restore order on the streets of his hometown. He has several rules and one of them is that he will never leave leaving the territory dirty. Whether it’s a bottle left behind after drinking or someone’s forgotten refrigerator, the street cleaner will get rid of everything.
Have you ever dreamed of cleaning the streets? This game is for you
Features:
-Various locations for cleaning
-Atmospheric
-A puzzle game where at each level you will find 7 hidden objects that need to be removed (taken to the car). Items can be either just bottles or refrigerators.
-Achievements

item.title: Jump Malcolm Jump
item.description:
About This Game

Leap into Action in the World of Jump Malcolm Jump

Embark on a jump-filled odyssey in this captivating 3D platformer that seamlessly blends arcade excitement with daring dashes. As Malcolm, your charismatic hero, you’ll soar through imaginative low poly environments, mastering the art of jumping and dashing to collect precious Energy Orbs scattered across diverse realms. Here’s what makes this game an exhilarating adventure:

* Diverse Realms: Explore a variety of landscapes, each with its own unique challenges. From the fiery depths of the Volcanic World to the bustling urban sprawl of City Scape, every world presents a fresh adventure waiting to be conquered.

* Dash to Victory: It’s not just about jumping; harness the power of the dash to blaze through obstacles and navigate treacherous terrain. Strategize your moves and execute flawless combinations to maximize your progress.

* Arcade Thrills: Capture the essence of classic arcade games as you dodge hazards and race against the clock. Feel the adrenaline rush as you leap and dash your way to victory.

* Global Leaderboards: Compete against players worldwide! Climb the ranks and prove your jumping prowess by earning a spot on the global leaderboards. Can you reach the top?

* Casual Adventure: Whether you’re a seasoned gamer or just looking for a quick gaming fix, this game offers excitement that suits every player. Dive into this captivating 3D platformer and experience the perfect blend of fast-paced action, precise jumping, and cunning strategy.

item.title: Lightist
item.description:
About This Game

This is an interesting physics puzzle game.
You need to draw creative shapes to linkage with light.
The floowing are the main features of this game:



Everyting you draw will turn into physical entity(objects).
These objects will follow physical laws like gravity, friction, leverage, conservation of momentum…
Don't worry if you're not good at physics. Using your common sense will be enough.



To make the objects you create meet expectation, drawing process needs to be precise.
Perhaps you cannot draw that accurately right away, but you have countless opportunities to try, and trying is the charm of mathematics.



Sometimes you may at a loss of what to do next.
Well, just jump out of the box. Things look impossible or ridiculous may turn out to be the right answer finally.



Through logical reasoning, you can predict what will happen after you create one object.
As the game progresses, you will encounter more complex scenes, but on the other hand, unlock more features.
Enjoy the process of thinking and you will gain a lot.

item.title: Do A Barrel Roll??
item.description:
About This Game

Do A Barrel Roll?? provides a challenging and punishing platforming experience. Despite the punishing level design that may undo a lot of progress with a mistake. There is no time for being sad because the hesitation will only increase the damage. With a combination of skill and level knowledge. Taking appropriate action in the right time can minimize the damage. Providing a punishing yet fair gameplay experience. Exploring more potential save or route when progressing through the level. Providing a unique and satisfying experience. Climb the mountain or not, it's up to you. This is a journey only belongs to you. So may it be meaningful.

Each area presents different themes and Characters. Apart from the first area, each later area will also introduce a new level mechanic to keep the gameplay fresh. The first area act as the training area. Introducing most tricks from basic mechanic. Ability of preforming these tricks will be truly put to the test in the later areas.

Gameplay:

- Unique Control Scheme
The barrel is fully controlled by the cursor. Where Moving the cursor around the barrel to spin it. And clicking on the ground to jump toward the opposite direction. Player will needs to adjusting the momentum of the barrel and aiming for the jump at the same time. Which the two controls directly affecting each other. Demanding a constant attention to the barrel and the level at the same time.


- Exploring and Observing the Level
The barrel won't stop moving since it is rounded. But it doesn't mean no resting is allowed. You can press [esc] to stand up when on a flat ground and being almost still. Sometime taking a break can have you better prepare for the future. When standing up, you can look further. Identifying potential speed run route or saving method from a mistake.

- Recover from Mistake
Human makes mistake, we all do. It is ok to make mistake, but there is no time to feel bad. As you will have to minimize the damage the mistake does to you. It do make a huge different. Since it is possible to undo all the progress if you do nothing and just watch it fall. Therefore, identify potential danger and saving method will be a big deal.


- Creative Use of Mechanics
The control may looks simple. But there is probably a lot deeper than you think. Apart from how well can you control it to do platforming. It is almost also a puzzle game for the way of progressing through level with the mechanics you have on your hand.


Credit:
Featuring Music by Matthew Pablo
http://www.matthewpablo.com

Featuring Music by The Cynic Project
https://cynicmusic.com/
